name: Intake: Be Aggressive
description:
Master your reflexes with the fastest shooter ever created!

*Note: Intake is a high-performance game; close other apps for best results. *

Intake is the new retro-futuristic drugstep arcade shooter from Cipher Prime. In this psychedelic shooter, you battle a never-ending barrage of pills, pushing your skill and reflexes to the limit to avoid a lethal dosage. Blast and combo your way through an epic cascade of audiovisual mayhem so intoxicating it comes with its own warning label.

FULL GAMECENTER SUPPORT!

FEATURES
* Classic Arcade Shooter: From its aspect ratio to its fast-paced gameplay, Intake is directly inspired by classic arcade shooters and SHMUPs with just a hint of FPS love.
* Achievements: Over 70 finely tuned achievements that will teach even the most seasoned player new tricks. These are not your typical progress-only achievements.
* Challenge Modes: Acceleration, Minefield, Reaction, and Flood modes will challenge every aspect of how you play.
* Gameplay Changing Features: Grab vitamins while you play and trade them in for intense game upgrades. You can even turn the game into a SHMUP if you show your skills.
* Dubstep Soundtrack: Infinite wubs. Classy ones.
* High Scoreboard and Game Stats: Keep track of your high scores and other gameplay statistics.
* Colorblind Modes: Intake offers colorblind modes for players with deuteranopia, protanopia, and tritanopia.
